0.5.name: wordpress/sonne
0.5.description: Sonne simplistic startup theme to be extended based on requests and ideas. 3.1+ supported theme, based on custom menu, post formats and using CSS3 effects. Simplistic, 2-column body index page, custom logo header, clean and reusable codebase.
